thread.title: Sophie

author: Sophie
title: Sophie
text: Everything that was online looked really nice, I just wish they would give you a small heads up about what your getting into before your about to check out. I feel like the should give you a warning while you are signing up because you get all excited about getting these new leggings then you see wha being a VIP member means, and you end up thinking twice. Other then that everything was amazing!! I
